definition: conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: The goodness of God should have put them to shame, for they continually sinned against Him.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的美善，倒要突顯人們不斷犯罪的可恥。

sentences.english: The poll, he said, highlights a number of worrying trends.
sentences.chinese: 他說，該調查突顯出一些令人擔憂的趨勢。

sentences.english: Each crystal is hand-cut to enhance every piece's unique colour and sparkle.
sentences.chinese: 每顆水晶均於人工切割，突顯其獨特色澤和流麗光彩。

sentences.english: Devastating floods last year highlighted the benefits of dams on the Indus.
sentences.chinese: 去年破壞嚴重的洪水突顯了在印度河建造大壩的好處。

sentences.english: In the case of tax dodging, the results were even more striking.
sentences.chinese: 對於逃漏稅的問題，測試結果甚至更爲突顯。

sentences.english: Her black hair framed her angular face and reached her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她一頭黑髮齊肩，突顯出有棱有角的臉龐。

sentences.english: At fault may be the very idea of highlighting a site's particular merits.
sentences.chinese: 有過失可能正是一種來突顯古蹟的特殊價值的辦法。
在月中突顯溝通和教育。

sentences.english: But the fragility of world food markets has been underscored by the tragic events of this summer.
sentences.chinese: 但今夏一些悲劇性事件更突顯了脆弱的世界糧食市場。

sentences.english: The frequent incidents over the past month have highlighted the danger of loose and corroded aluminium window frames.
sentences.chinese: 意外頻頻發生，突顯鋁窗鬆脫和侵蝕的危險。

sentences.english: A GPS navigational system can highlight danger on the road.
sentences.chinese: GPS導航系統可以突顯道路上的危險物。

sentences.english: The vermilion gates and windows better highlight the wealth and rank of her family.
sentences.chinese: 朱漆的門窗更能突顯她家的榮華富貴。

sentences.english: With the development of Criterion-referenced tests, standard setting becomes more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 隨着標準參照測驗的興起，標準設定的作用日益突顯。

sentences.english: And yet, it could be a transformative deal whose full implications will take years to emerge.
sentences.chinese: 但它的變革性意義將在數年之後完整地突顯出來。

sentences.english: The tale of Saint George and the evil dragon he killed best shows the difference.
sentences.chinese: 而最能突顯這項差異的就是聖喬治宰殺惡龍的故事。

sentences.english: Elegant interior design accentuating the unique feeling of space.
sentences.chinese: 優雅的室內設計突顯了獨特的空間感。

definition: to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
